title: Q3. Would my company benefit from digital marketing?
text: A full service digital marketing agency is one that manages all aspects of a company's online presence. This kind of agency’s different from a departments that focus on one area.

title: Q4. Would my company benefit from digital marketing?
text: A website that sits stagnant for long periods of time, without any new or fresh content, is nothing more that an online brochure for company. A successful website will interact with consumers.

title: Q5. How often should I update my website?
text: Digital marketing is a must for building a successful business. It is a growing your brand or improving sales, there are no limits to it. In the digital space, you can take advantage of it and future-proof.

title: Q6. Is email marketing still effective?
text: Definitely! You should never assume that because social media has a become so hugely popular, that it’s enough to solely focus your digital marketing strategy on social platforms.
